text: Ba bandi (indyarya) babatega iminsi, maze mwagira intsinzi iturutse kwa Allah, bakavuga bati “Ese ntitwari kumwe namwe?” Nyamara iyo abahakanyi batsinze barababwira bati “Ese ntitwabateye ingabo mu bitugu (tukabakingira ikibaba) tukanabarinda abemera?” Allah azabakiranura ku munsi w’imperuka, kandi Allah ntazigera aha abahakanyi ubushobozi bwo gutsinda abemera
